sentences.en: A large wave caused our little boat to turn turtle.
sentences.cn: 一阵巨浪将我们的小船打翻了.

sentences.en: A turtle in a jar is certainly caught within the reach.
A turtle lays many eggs at once.
A turtle obtrudes its head from its shell.
sentences.cn: 龟将它的头从甲壳中伸出来.

sentences.en: After colliding, both cars turned turtle.
sentences.cn: 碰撞后, 两部车都翻个四脚天.

sentences.en: AFTER dinner all the gang turned out to hunt for turtle eggs on the bar.
sentences.cn: 午饭以后,海盗帮全体出动到沙洲上去找乌龟蛋.

sentences.en: But you went turtle - ing for years off the Mosquito Coast and your eyes are good.
sentences.cn: “你可在莫斯基托海岸外捕了好多年海龟,你的眼力还是挺好的嘛. ”

sentences.en: Eventually the turtle has been butted all the way down to the floor of the tank.
sentences.cn: 最后,海龟一直被打到了池底.

sentences.en: He had no mysticism about turtles although he had gone in turtle boats for many years.
sentences.cn: 他对海龟并不抱着神秘的看法,尽管他曾多年乘小船去捕海龟.

sentences.en: If you turn over a turtle on its back, it will become helpless.
sentences.cn: 假如你把海龟翻过来, 它就无能为力了.

sentences.en: It looked like a flat stone but it was a turtle.
sentences.cn: 它看来像一块扁扁的石头,但却是一只乌龟.

sentences.en: The spill could wipe out the Gulf's turtle population.
sentences.cn: 这次原油泄漏可能会使波斯湾的海龟灭绝。

sentences.en: The tug nearly turned turtle twice, but I managed to keep her upright.
sentences.cn: 拖船两次都差点翻个儿，但我设法稳住了船身。

sentences.en: They are Germans so they are capable and they can get turtle in these months.
sentences.cn: 他们是德国人,还有几招.再说这几个月里,他们还可以抓海龟吃.

sentences.en: You went turtle - catching for years off the Mosquito Coast and your eyes are good.
sentences.cn: 你在摩斯基多海湾捉了好些年的海龟,你的眼睛还是好好的.

phrases.tran_cn: 忍者神龟（美国动画电影）

trans.tran_en: a  reptile  that lives mainly in water and has a soft body covered by a hard shell
